item.title: Tariffs could put them under, some small business owners say
item.description: President Trump's tariffs could be "the nail in the coffin for many of us," the owner of a Portland, Oregon, clothing store said.

item.description: Self deporting has been something the Trump Administration has been pushing.

item.title: Boat washes ashore with 3 dead, 9 unaccounted for, 4 survivors
item.description: Three dead bodies and four survivors in need of medical care were discovered on a boat that washed ashore near San Diego on Monday morning.
